data.name: Wild Terra 2 - Halloween Pack
data.detailed_description:
Halloween Pack:

  • Unique Halloween Cloak
  • Skeletal Horse mount
  • Jack-o'-lantern in a bone hand (Torch skin)
  • Halloween Avatar
  • Coffin (bed skin - a place of resurrection)

After purchase, you need to re-enter the game so that all rewards will be added to your account.
data.about_the_game:
Halloween Pack:

  • Unique Halloween Cloak
  • Skeletal Horse mount
  • Jack-o'-lantern in a bone hand (Torch skin)
  • Halloween Avatar
  • Coffin (bed skin - a place of resurrection)

After purchase, you need to re-enter the game so that all rewards will be added to your account.
data.short_description: A special pack of unique Halloween rewards!
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Italian, Ukrainian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Phenom II X4 with at least 2,5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 460/Radeon HD 5850/Intel HD 4600 with at least 1024 MB video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD Phenom II X6 with at least 3,5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660/Radeon HD 6970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
